_header: Among all other take heed of one thing

BodLauMis581.Transcription:
Amongest all other take hede of one thyngematters make lyttle
                    medling
BodLauMis581.Editions:
Skeat,  Walter William,
                        ed.  
             William Langland: The Vision of Piers Plowman.
            Vol. 2: Text B.
             EETS
         o.s. 38 (1869); repr. 1972: viii.
